##### Result table

```{r results_table, echo=FALSE, out.width = "50%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,}
dataPlot <- dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]]$results_CPR$list_res[[listname]][[domain]]
DT::datatable(dataPlot@result[dataPlot@result$p.adjust < dataPlot@pvalueCutoff, ]%>% dplyr::select(!c("geneID", "qvalue")), # sometimes it prints non significant results...
                    rownames = FALSE,
                    options = list(rownames = FALSE, pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20), scrollX = T))

```

```{r, , echo=FALSE, out.width = "50%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
write.table(dataPlot@result[dataPlot@result$p.adjust < dataPlot@pvalueCutoff, ],
            file=paste0(listnameDir,"Table_of_Enriched_terms.txt"),
            sep="\t",quote=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,row.names=FALSE)
```


##### Dotplot

```{r dotplot_CPR, echo=FALSE, out.width = "50%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 7}
dataPlot <- dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]]$results_CPR$list_res[[listname]][[domain]]
p <- dotplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15) + 
  ggtitle(paste0(listname, "\nEnrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
print(p)
```

##### Heatplot

```{r Heatplot, echo=FALSE, out.width = "50%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 12, fig.height = 7}
dataPlot <- dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]]$results_CPR$list_res[[listname]][[domain]]
p <-  heatplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15, foldChange = log2FC_vect) + 
                                   labs(fill="log2FC") + 
                                   scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "white", high = "red", midpoint = 0) +
                                   theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10)) + 
                                   ggtitle(paste0(listname, " - Enrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
suppressMessages(print(p))# delete warnings for scale fill replacement
```


##### Cnetplot

```{r CnetPlot, echo=FALSE, out.width = "50%", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 12, fig.height = 7}
dataPlot <- dataset.SE@metadata[[annot]]$results_CPR$list_res[[listname]][[domain]]
p <- cnetplot(dataPlot, showCategory = 15, foldChange = log2FC_vect, node_label = "category") + 
  guides(colour=guide_colourbar(title = "log2FC")) +
  scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue", mid = "white", high = "red", midpoint = 0) + 
  ggtitle(paste0(listname, " - Enrichment analysis result on domain ", domain, "\nFirst 15 enriched terms"))
suppressMessages(print(p)) # delete warnings for scale fill replacement
```
